description: While Johnny B's up on the rooftop like another well-known stocking stuffer, he daydreams of being snuggled up with the holiday helpers tending to the yard. And when he takes a tumble off the roof and wakes up to Spencer Laval and Ryan Jordan tending to him instead, it's a Christmas wish cum early for Johnny. Even though he's definitely been naughty the whole year round, he still has found quite a few presents to unwrap, and Spencer and Ryan are prove that this is the gift that keeps giving and giving and giving it. Luckily, Johnny is ready to take all the holiday humping they can share. If this is any indication, it's gonna be one happy, horny holiday!Enjoy!
series: NDB - 5039 - Spencer Laval, Ryan Jordan & Johnny B
title: Christmas Wish Cum True
